I decided to purchase her this ring again for her birthday because she loves it so much and was so sad that she lost the stone somewhere. The only reason I give this four stars and not five is because of the ring coming apart last time and the stone getting loose and falling out. 评论详情: Real crystal moon stone. Stone is set NOT glued so it will last for a very long time without falling out. The silver is 925 so no green fingers or tarnishing. Silver shake is my GO TO for anything silver with real crystals on a BUDGET!! I’ve had this ring since 2022!! It still looks exactly like the day I received it! For the price I would’ve been happy if it lasted 6 months but I’ve been wearing it for 2 YEARS NOW AND only have good things to say about it! You will love your new silver ring by Silver Shake & if you don’t absolutely LOVE your new ring it’s easy peasy lemon squeezy to exchange, return or speak to customer service! HIGHLY RECOMMEND SILVER SHAKE!! Just bought a black onyx ring like my moon stone one and I LOVE that one too!! PLUS THE FACT THEY HAVE HALF SIZES AND .25 SIZES TO GET YOUR PERFECT FIT!! I’ve never seen any other ring companies do .25 & .5 sizes. I had to order a 7.5 for one finger and a 7.25 for my other finger bc the 7 or 8 didn’t fit right! So THANK YOU SILVER SHAKE FOR MAKING MY PERFECT SIZE RING! Seriously best silver company ever!!!

I think the rings run a little big, I’m normally a size 6.5/7 & went down to a 6.

评论详情: I had my Fiancé buy this ring for the "placement" ring until we go and buy a real ring. The ring is a bit larger for the size I thought I bought, (I bought a size 12, my finger might be slightly smaller). It doesn't slip off my knuckle but the moonstone turns as I use my hands. I have tried different fingers, but found that the rotating is a struggle to wear and find it fatiguing.  But for under $20 a ring for my large fingers. It is beautiful (I have received compliments). It just might be too solid for everyday use, but have no issues of breakage despite an active job and wearing it during chores.

I looked at this ring for ages before I finally bought it.  So glad I did.  It's lovely and just what I wanted.  The stone and craftmanship are very good for the price of the ring.  And, it comes in half sizes which you never find.  I'm a 6 1/2 ring size; it fits perfectly.

This ring is by far one of my most cherished pieces of jewelery. I have purchased this ring from the same seller twice now. The first ring I ended up having to cut off my finger because for some reason my finger swelled so much it was impossible to remove the ring, I was devestated that I had to do that. I loved the ring so much I continued to wear it even though it had a cut mark, I still wore it proudly until it became too uncomfortable. I finally decided to buy a new one. I bought this ring as a gift for myself during a really challenging time in my life about 8 years ago. I wore it every single day and never did it tarnish or turn my skin green. I never took it off unless I was taking a shower. I wore it while cleaning, yard work, wearing lotion, hand washing, and even sleeping. All of the things they suggest you DON'T do, I did and this ring still maintained its original beauty. I am not kidding. This ring is one of the only rings I have ever owned that has not faded and looked dull and tired the older it gets. I have several hundred dollar rings that havn't come close to the quality as this ring. That's saying something. I absolutely recommend this ring. Don't even think about it, just do it. I promise you will love it just as much as I do. It's also very true to size and looks amazing.
